name: Museum Eddy
description:
Rotate the pictures in the gallery to fix them 
Instructions:
Left-click on the red button on the desk to start when u are near it
look down with mouse at the paper in order to match the picture
Left click on picture to rotate it 

You can play it again and again for fun without alt-f4 it
Just press the red button

Note: some of the data were wiped due to blackout and I just uploaded it to be in the jam

HF <3

Made as part of ScribbleJam
